alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 3:25PM CDT until September 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR MUCH OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING AND THE NEBRASKA PANHANDLE TODAY DUE TO GUSTY WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 431, 433, 434, 435, 436, AND 437... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 417...431...433 and 434 through 437. * WIND...West to northwest winds 10 to 20 mph sustained with gusts to 30 mph possible. Winds shift to northeast at 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph early afternoon from north to south. * HUMIDITY...7 to 15 percent. * HAINES...5 TO 6 * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms are likely Thursday afternoon leading to additional fire starts. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
